data.title: City of Compton, CA Traffic Regulations
data.meta_description: Ch 12  Editor's Note: For regulations concerning Abandoned Vehicles, see Chapter 8, Section 8-5. For statutory provisions authorizing the City to regulate traffic, see Vehicle Code § 31100 et seq. For billing procedure for drug or alcohol related traffic accide
data.text: Nothing in this section is intended to limit the authority of the City Manager or his/her designee to establish green restricted parking zones or yellow loading zones.
